name: Aavegotchi
introduce: Aavegotchi is a DeFi-enabled crypto collectibles game developed by Pixelcraft Studios that allows players to stake Non-fungible tokens (NFTs) avatars with interest-generating tokens and interact with the Aavegotchi metaverse. To level up their Aavegotchis, players can participate in a variety of activities including mini-games, governance, and meetups.
